title: Introduction to ROS 2 and Robotic Middleware
description: Learn the fundamentals of ROS 2 as the robotic nervous system for humanoid control, communication, and embodiment

frontMatter.title: Introduction to ROS 2 and Robotic Middleware
frontMatter.description: Learn the fundamentals of ROS 2 as the robotic nervous system for humanoid control, communication, and embodiment
learning_outcomes: Explain the role of ROS 2 in Physical AI and humanoid robotics

learning_outcomes.Identify and describe the core component: nodes, topics, services, and message passing

learning_outcomes: Understand real-time constraints and DDS concepts in robotics
Recognize how ROS 2 enables communication between different parts of a robotic system
